materials: Plastic #1 (PETE); Plastic #2 (HDPE); Plastic #2 (Color HDPE); Plastic #4 (LDPE); Plastic #5 (Polypropylene); Aluminum Cans; Glass (Brown); Lead Acid (Pb) Batteries; Cardboard; Glass (Clear); Ferrous Metals (Steel or Iron); Clothes Hangers (Metal); Non-ferrous (Copper/Brass/Tin); Tin or Steel Cans; Used Tires; Yard Waste; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes:
The landfill is located near the south foot of Number 6 Road.  To access the site, drive east on Steveston Highway from the interchange with Highway 99.  Turn north on Number 6 road, then turn east on Triangle Road.  Follow Triangle Road to the site entrance.  

Please call ahead of time to find out what charges will be associated with the materials being dropped off if any. For additional information please log onto www.gvrd.bc.ca or call 604-277-1410.
